jchess.cache

Class BoardData

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchess.cache.BoardData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoard, IBoardData

    public final class BoardData
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBoardData
    This is a data class to that stores Chess-board related details in the cache. It basically maps XML or DB structure for Chess-board to memory.
    Since:
    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
